statements: SELECT * FROM ProvisioningTemplates;
SELECT template_id, infrastructure_type, resource_name FROM ProvisioningTemplates;
SELECT container_image, resource_name, template_id FROM ProvisioningTemplates;
SELECT * FROM ProvisioningTemplates WHERE infrastructure_type = 'AWS';
SELECT template_id, provision_script FROM ProvisioningTemplates WHERE resource_name LIKE '%database%';
SELECT template_id, resource_name, container_image FROM ProvisioningTemplates WHERE infrastructure_type = 'AWS' ORDER BY template_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProvisioningTemplates WHERE container_image LIKE '%nginx%' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT template_id, infrastructure_type, provision_script FROM ProvisioningTemplates WHERE resource_name = 'WebServer' ORDER BY infrastructure_type ASC;
SELECT COUNT(template_id) AS total_templates, infrastructure_type FROM ProvisioningTemplates GROUP BY infrastructure_type HAVING COUNT(template_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM ProvisioningTemplates WHERE container_image IS NOT NULL AND provision_script IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM virtual_machines;
SELECT vm_name, vm_template FROM virtual_machines;
SELECT container_name FROM containers WHERE container_id = 1;
SELECT container_id, container_name, container_image FROM containers WHERE container_id > 5;
SELECT vm_id FROM virtual_machines WHERE vm_name LIKE '%prod%' ORDER BY vm_id DESC;
SELECT vm_id, vm_name FROM virtual_machines WHERE vm_id > 100 ORDER BY vm_name DESC;
SELECT container_id, container_name FROM containers WHERE container_image LIKE '%mysql%' ORDER BY container_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_machines WHERE vm_name = 'web-server' AND vm_template = 'Ubuntu 20.04';
SELECT vm_name, vm_template FROM virtual_machines WHERE vm_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY vm_id ASC;
SELECT container_id, container_name, container_image FROM containers WHERE container_name LIKE 'prod%' AND container_image != 'nginx';
SELECT template_name, os FROM vm_templates;
SELECT template_name, cpu_cores FROM vm_templates WHERE memory_gb > 8;
SELECT * FROM container_templates WHERE port IS NOT NULL;
SELECT template_name, image_name FROM container_templates WHERE template_name LIKE 'web%';
SELECT template_id, provision_date, status FROM provision_history ORDER BY provision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vm_templates;
SELECT template_name, os FROM vm_templates WHERE memory_gb > 8 ORDER BY template_name ASC;
SELECT template_name, cpu_cores FROM vm_templates WHERE os = 'Ubuntu' ORDER BY cpu_cores DESC;
SELECT template_name, image_name, port FROM container_templates WHERE port IS NOT NULL;
SELECT provision_id, provision_date, status FROM provision_history WHERE status = 'success' ORDER BY provision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vm_templates;
SELECT template_name, os_type, ram_gb FROM vm_templates WHERE cpu_cores > 4;
SELECT template_name, cpu_cores FROM vm_templates WHERE os_type = 'Linux';
SELECT * FROM container_templates WHERE image_name LIKE '%nginx%';
SELECT template_name, provision_date, provision_status FROM vm_provisioning_history ORDER BY provision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vm_templates WHERE cpu_cores > 4;
SELECT template_name, ram_gb FROM vm_templates WHERE os_type = 'Linux' ORDER BY template_name ASC;
SELECT template_id, os_type, cpu_cores FROM vm_templates WHERE cpu_cores BETWEEN 2 AND 4 AND os_type = 'Windows';
SELECT template_name, ports, environment_variables FROM container_templates WHERE ports LIKE '%8080%' ORDER BY template_name DESC;
SELECT template_name, provision_date FROM container_provisioning_history WHERE provision_status = 'SUCCESS' ORDER BY provision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_machines WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, cpu_count, memory_gb FROM virtual_machines WHERE cpu_count > 4;
SELECT id, name, os FROM virtual_machines WHERE memory_gb <= 8 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, image, cpu_limit, status FROM containers WHERE status = 'running';
SELECT * FROM templates WHERE os_type = 'Linux' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM virtual_machines WHERE cpu_count > 4;
SELECT name, os FROM containers WHERE status = 'running' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT t.name, t.description, ct.container_type FROM templates t JOIN container_templates ct ON t.id = ct.template_id WHERE t.os_type = 'Linux' AND ct.environment_vars->>'DB_HOST' = 'localhost';

SELECT vm.name AS vm_name, tm.name AS template_name, vm.cpu_count, vm.memory_gb, tm.os_type FROM virtual_machines vm JOIN vm_templates vt ON vm.id = vt.template_id JOIN templates tm ON vt.template_id = tm.id WHERE vm.os = 'Ubuntu';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM virtual_machines WHERE memory_gb > 16 OR cpu_count < 2;
